page.title: 18Media_Express and Star
page.content: An interview with Brian Summers a general reporter with Wolverhampton Express and Star. The paper covers region of 1000square miles from Stafford to Hereford, Worcester to Telford. Even sold in coastal towns of Wales in summer so midlanders can read news of home. 240,000 papers go out each day,read by an estimated four million people. The main ain of the Express and Star is to cover national news and stories of local interest. Photographs are also very important. There are pages for women, sport, motoring,business. There is little for children except for colour cartoons in Saturday edition. Would be a good idea to in clude more, if children suggest things they would like to see. Paperb is financed by advertising mainly as cost of 16p is very low.
